author: jbonofre
msg: Revert my assembly changes as Chris updates to Karaf 1.4.1-SNAPSHOT which provide the correct felix framework version.

author: marrs
msg: Added a service.pid to the UserAdmin service, because it did not have one and the spec requires the user admin to send its pid as part of each event. Because this pid was missing, user admin was trying to send invalid events and failed to work (but only if event admin is actually present). Furthermore, fixed a typo in a class name.

author: jbonofre
msg: Add a workaround to add Felix framework 2.0.4 in the assembly as Karaf 1.3.0-SNAPSHOT uses framework 2.0.3.

author: danushka
msg: committing changes to site to reflect new mailing lists, svn locations, etc

author: wrowe
msg: No support for 9x now in this package, long live 20yo 'New Technology (tm)'
